statements.query: MATCH (n:AWSDNSRecord)-[:MEMBER_OF_DNS_ZONE]->(:AWSDNSZone)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:Ip)<-[r:DNS_POINTS_TO]-(:AWSDNSRecord)-[:MEMBER_OF_DNS_ZONE]->(:AWSDNSZone)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:ESDomain)<-[r:DNS_POINTS_TO]-(:DNSRecord)-[:MEMBER_OF_DNS_ZONE]->(:AWSDNSZone)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:NameServer)<-[r:DNS_POINTS_TO]-(:AWSDNSRecord)-[:MEMBER_OF_DNS_ZONE]->(:AWSDNSZone)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:EC2Instance)<-[r:DNS_POINTS_TO]-(:AWSDNSRecord)-[:MEMBER_OF_DNS_ZONE]->(:AWSDNSZone)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:LoadBalancer)<-[r:DNS_POINTS_TO]-(:AWSDNSRecord)-[:MEMBER_OF_DNS_ZONE]->(:AWSDNSZone)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AWSDNSRecord)<-[r:DNS_POINTS_TO]-(:AWSDNSRecord)-[:MEMBER_OF_DNS_ZONE]->(:AWSDNSZone)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

name: cleanup AWS resources after all accounts are ingested
